abstracts.cdata!:
The revised Second Port Project consists
            of: (a) construction of three berths, storage facilities and
            port administration buildings; (b) port dredging; (c)
            consultants' services for engineering and supervision
            of construction; (d) purchase of port operating and fire
            fighting equipment; and (e) technical assistance to MMA.
